arts.ttl: Captain Cullen leads Burnley to victory in newly-promoted clash with Sunderland
arts.sum: Burnley record their first Premier League victory of the season with a 2-0 win over fellow promoted side Sunderland at Turf Moor on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Burnley off the mark as Cullen and Anthony goals bring Sunderland down to earth
arts.sum: The last time Burnley were in the Premier League, they won twice at home on the way to a desperate relegation. Goals from the newly-installed captain Josh Cullen and Jaidon Anthony against Sunderland mean they are already halfway to that tally. Cullen’s predecessor, Josh Brownhill, was instrumental in bringing Burnley up, and the replacement set the tone with a fine opener and assist for the second. Turf Moor was clearly nervous from the off, with memories of earning 10 points here two seasons ago fresh in the mind. The victory was hard-earned through discipline, graft and one of the few moments of quality in the 90 minutes to offer hope that this time might be different for Burnley after becoming a yo-yo club. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Lift off! Cullen and Anthony get Burnley off the mark with Sunderland win
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League match between Burnley and Sunderland.

arts.ttl: Anthony and Cullen combine to fire Burnley past Sunderland
arts.sum: Josh Cullen and Jaidon Anthony combined twice to secure a 2-0 win for Burnley against fellow newly-promoted side Sunderland.

arts.ttl: Andy’s Player Ratings: Burnley 2-0 Sunderland – Lads fall to 1st defeat of the season
arts.sum: Robin Roefs: 6/10 Didn’t make a save but had to pick the ball out of the net twice thanks to two good finishes, one curled into the far post and another after he was rounded late on following a break. Looked assured but a quiet game. Trai Hume: 7/10 Thought he did well at right […]

arts.ttl: Burnley up and running in Premier League but Sunderland come back down to earth
arts.sum: Second-half goals from Josh Cullen and Jaidon Anthony gave the Clarets their first points back in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Sunderland XI vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland travel to Turf Moor on Saturday, aiming to build on their spectacular start to the Premier League season. After a stunning 3-0 victory over West Ham, Régis Le Bris’s side are full of confidence. This clash against a fellow promoted team provides the perfect opportunity to prove that their opening-day performance was no fluke. arts.ttl: Burnley vs Sunderland – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: The second weekend of the Premier League season presents a pivotal clash for two newly-promoted clubs as Sunderland travel to Burnley full of confidence after a stunning opening-day win. The hosts, however, are already under pressure. Scott Parker’s side must bounce back from a heavy defeat at Tottenham to avoid an early slide.
